thread.title: Matt Damon Poses As Tom Brady To Sneak His Way Back On ‘Kimmel’ To Continue His Feud
thread.title_full: Matt Damon Poses As Tom Brady To Sneak His Way Back On ‘Kimmel’ To Continue His Feud

author: Andrew Roberts
title: Matt Damon Poses As Tom Brady To Sneak His Way Back On ‘Kimmel’ To Continue His Feud
text:
Matt Damon finally found a way to get back on Jimmy Kimmel Live, using a little Super Bowl trickery to be a guest on the show. Everybody was fooled, even Guillermo who wanted his football signed. But like usual, he flies too close to the Sun and ends up grabbing the attention of Jimmy. Damon gets a little celebrating in before security walks him off, but I would call this a win. 
The long-running feud between Kimmel and Damon is always a good source of entertainment on Jimmy Kimmel Live, even if the continuity of it all has become pretty murky over the years. It has given us a lot of great moments and viral clips to share around online, including “I’m F*cking Matt Damon” which kinda sparked off some weird love triangle with Ben Affleck.
